statements: SELECT * FROM rewards_points WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, points FROM rewards_points WHERE category = 'Grocery' ORDER BY points DESC
SELECT SUM(points) AS total_points FROM rewards_points
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM rewards_points ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM rewards_points WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM rewards_points GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, category, points FROM rewards_points WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, category, AVG(points) AS avg_points FROM rewards_points GROUP BY user_id, category HAVING avg_points > 50 ORDER BY user_id, category;
SELECT category, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users FROM rewards_points GROUP BY category ORDER BY unique_users DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(points) AS max_points_earned, MIN(points) AS min_points_earned FROM rewards_points GROUP BY user_id HAVING max_points_earned > 500 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards_program;
SELECT reward_id, spending_category, points_earned FROM rewards_program ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT credit_card_number, spending_category FROM rewards_program WHERE points_earned > 1000;
SELECT * FROM spending_history WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT credit_card_number, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM spending_history GROUP BY credit_card_number HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT * FROM rewards_program WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT credit_card_number, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM rewards_program GROUP BY credit_card_number;
SELECT * FROM spending_history WHERE merchant_name LIKE 'Amazon%' AND transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT credit_card_number, transaction_date FROM spending_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT credit_card_number, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM spending_history GROUP BY credit_card_number HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points WHERE total_points > 100
SELECT user_id, total_points FROM rewards_points ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT user_id, category_id, amount_spent FROM user_spending WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT category_name FROM spending_categories WHERE category_id = 3
SELECT user_id, category_id, amount_spent FROM user_spending JOIN rewards_points ON user_spending.user_id = rewards_points.user_id
SELECT user_id, total_points FROM rewards_points WHERE total_points > 1000 ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM spending_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%food%' ORDER BY category_id
SELECT user_id, category_id, amount_spent FROM user_spending WHERE amount_spent BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 ORDER BY user_id, category_id

SELECT user_id, total_points, category_name, amount_spent FROM rewards_points JOIN user_spending ON rewards_points.user_id = user_spending.user_id JOIN spending_categories ON user_spending.category_id = spending_categories.category_id WHERE total_points < 5000 AND amount_spent > 100.00 ORDER BY user_id, total_points DESC

SELECT total_points, SUM(amount_spent) AS total_spent FROM rewards_points JOIN user_spending ON rewards_points.user_id = user_spending.user_id GROUP BY total_points HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_points
SELECT * FROM credit_cards_rewards;
SELECT cardholder_name, rewards_points FROM credit_cards_rewards ORDER BY rewards_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM spending_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM spending_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%food%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards_rewards;
SELECT cardholder_name, rewards_points FROM credit_cards_rewards WHERE rewards_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM spending_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, SUM(rewards_points) AS total_points FROM credit_cards_rewards GROUP BY cardholder_name;
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.category_name, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions t JOIN spending_categories c ON t.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users;
SELECT card_type, card_limit, expiry_date FROM credit_cards;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM spending_categories;
SELECT user_id, card_id, points_accumulated FROM rewards_points WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT card_id, card_type, card_limit, expiry_date FROM credit_cards WHERE card_id = 3;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM spending_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
